channel.title: Minigame Kill-count

item.title: Minigame Kill-count
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

thanks for the idea but this actually worked for me:

} else if (NpcDialogue == 1949){ } else if (Trocount == 1) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; addItem(Item.randomTroitem(), 1); Trocount -= 1; sendMessage("Congratulations on whatever you're prize is."); RemoveAllWindows();

Read full topic

item.title: Minigame Kill-count
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

err…

} else if (NpcDialogue == 1949){
           if (troCount == 1) {
                     NpcDialogue = 0;
                     NpcDialogueSend = false;
                     addItem(Item.randomTroitem(), 1);
                     troCount -= 1;
                     sendMessage("Congratulations on whatever you're prize is.");
                     RemoveAllWindows();

trocount == 1 means if you got 1 trocount you get the item. then the trocount -= 1 means it deletes the point after.

} else if (NpcDialogue == 1949){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; addItem(Item.randomTroitem(), 1); sendMessage("Congratulations on whatever you're prize is."); RemoveAllWindows();
